snippet: Three people were killed and four people were wounded in an apparent drive-by shooting at a Stockton convenience store Tuesday night.
abstract: Three people are killed and four wounded in apparent drive-by shooting at a Stockton, Calif, convenience store; no arrests have been made.
lead_paragraph: Three people were killed and four people were wounded in an apparent drive-by shooting at a Stockton convenience store Tuesday night.

headline.main: California: 7 Shot, 3 Fatally, at Convenience Store
headline.print_headline: California: 7 Shot, 3 Fatally, at Convenience Store
